mapper.insert: insert into user (id,login_name user_name, password, age,email,description,create_time,creator) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=BLOB}, #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into user
id,
login_name,
user_name,
password,
age,
email,
description,
create_time,
creator,

mapper.update:
update user
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=BLOB},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
